attributes.title: Put that thing back where it came from
attributes.review:
(Or so help me)
You’ll only get tik tok from my cold dead hands.

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!  🧚🏼✨
attributes.review: This app is absolutely TERRIBLE. They send out racist messages about “White Power” and homophobic things. Ugh I’m in #KARENMODE!!!! Totally disgusted and they HAVE gotten multiple nasty emails you best believe that!!!! #nomore!!!!!

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This app took forever to download then it wiped out all of the data on my phone!

attributes.title: 0/10 do not recommend
attributes.review: I’d rather be strapped to a chair and be forced to watch the 2019 version of Cats than download this ever again.

attributes.title: BIGGEST MISTAKE
attributes.review: I got this app to show my love for Donald Dump🏳️‍🌈 and it took 12 hours to download! I’m very impatient. I do not recommend this app. It also crashed a ton. It’s useless.

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: This is honestly just terrible. Save yourself a lot of time and energy and don’t download this at all.

attributes.title: Horrible !!!
attributes.review: My hands were too small to use it and for some reason an orange cheeto kept appearing. Horrible app.

attributes.title: HATE IT WORST PRESIDENT WORST APP
attributes.review: This app is horrible. Took 2 days to download. Other than the fact Donald Trump is THE worst president in the history, so is his app. Don’t delete tik tok. You have NO idea what we are capable of. xo😌

attributes.title: THE WORST APP TO EXIST
attributes.review: I would rather swallow a jean jacket, electrocute myself, rip my eyeballs out with my toes, and go into an open heart surgery with no anesthesia than ever have to deal with this app again.🧍🏻‍♀️

attributes.title: no ❤️
attributes.review:
🧚🏻‍♂️ ✨💅🏼 not feeling the vibes ❤️🧚🏻‍♂️🙈
Trump can ✨ d i e ✨
but this app hacked me 😢 The worst Part is that Trump wants to take down TikTok. Which is my life ✨ Apple store u cannot let him do u like that. 🤠
